title: The new 'Destiny' emotes might just be worth buying
text:
The new 'Destiny' emotes might just be worth buying 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
I won't blame you if you're skeptical of Bungie's plan to add purchasable emotes to Destiny on October 13th. Would you really want to pay fo...
